ARABIC: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They hold a wrong action against me and I fear that they may kill me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for me, they hold the charge of a crime against me. I fear they will put me to death."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have charged me [with a crime] for which I am afraid they will kill me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And they have an accusation against me, so I fear that they may kill me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they have a charge of crime against me, and I fear they will kill me. "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they have a crime against me, therefore I fear that they may slay me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They also have a sin against me, and I fear they will slay me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they have a crime against me, so I fear that they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: besides, they accuse me of a crime, and I fear that they may put me to death."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they have a crime against me, so I fear that they shall slay me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Besides, they have a charge against me, and I fear they will kill me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (further), they have a charge of crime against me; and I fear they may slay me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they have a charge of crime against me, and I fear they will kill me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They hold a sin against me, and I fear that they will kill me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they have a charge against me, so I fear they will kill me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:14] And I have sinned against them, by my slaying of the Egyptian man, and I fear they will slay me’, for this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they have a crime against me) they may retaliate against me because I killed the Copt, (so I fear that they will kill me) because of this Copt that I killed.
